title: Diary of Steve the Noob 2
description: Minecraft: Steve the Noob 2 (Funny Minecraft Story, Minecraft Books, Minecraft Books for Kids and Teens)   Read this Minecraft book FREE as part of your Amazon Prime or Kindle Unlimited membership   Follow Steve Again on a New Adventure!   After Steve's sad defeat in the previous book, he goes on a journey to try to redeem himself. What will he find out there in the wilderness? Is he going to starve to death? Will he ever find a way to stop the nightly plague? Find out in this next Minecraft diary of Steve the Noob.  Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
